error.signature: Error [ERR_REQUIRE_ESM]: require() of ES Module not supported

verdict.summary: Trying to require() an ESM-only package from CommonJS code.

dead_ends.action: Downgrade the ESM-only package to an older CJS version
dead_ends.why_fails: Misses security patches and new features

dead_ends.action: Use dynamic import() in CJS synchronously
dead_ends.why_fails: import() is async, cannot be used synchronously in CJS

workarounds.action: Convert your project to ESM (set type: module in package.json)
Use dynamic import() with await in an async context

leads_to.condition: Converting to ESM causes syntax errors in CJS files
ESM conversion changes module resolution rules

preceded_by.condition: Module resolution led to discovering ESM/CJS mismatch

frequently_confused_with.distinction: ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND is about missing modules; ERR_REQUIRE_ESM is about CJS code trying to require() an ESM module
